settings.title: Alfa Laval DuraCirc® Circumferential Piston Pump
settings.content: The revolutionary Alfa Laval DuraCirc® is the first circumferential piston pump that delivers the perfect balance of durability, reliability, high efficiency and superior hygienic performance. Combined with a broad range of flow rates and pressures along with capabilities for simple service, DuraCirc keeps your processes up and running.

settings.title: Alfa Laval DuraCirc® Aseptic Circumferential Piston Pump
settings.content: The Alfa Laval DuraCirc® Aseptic is a revolutionary circumferential piston pump for aseptic applications. It delivers the perfect balance of durability, reliability, high efficiency and superior hygienic performance. Combined with a broad range of flow rates and pressures along with capabilities for simple service, DuraCirc® Aseptic keeps your processes up and running.

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
